name: Loud Cloud the Storm Serpent
text:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 FIRE and 1 WIND monster from your GY.
● You can banish 1 FIRE monster from your GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to that destroyed monster’s original ATK.
● You can banish 1 WIND monster from your GY, then target 1 card in your opponent’s Spell & Trap Zone; destroy it.
You can only use each effect of "Loud Cloud the Storm Serpent" once per turn
